title: Why You Take URF???
body: Why You Gotta Take URF rito? Adleast Leave The Gamemode On Custom Pls.

replies.body: They won't do that  because too many people will play urf and not nuff play thier slooooow version (ie normal)

Pretty much.

In the eternal war between candy and brussel sprouts, that sparkly shiny sugary goodness is always going to win. Always.

Did mirror mode stay?

Like seriously I don't know.

Would they break consistency?
